text: Cwar Glas Quarry and Sawdde Gorge is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Carmarthen & Dinefwr, Wales. ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Carmarthen & Dinefwr Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Carmarthen & Dinefwr Category:Quarries in Wales
title: Cwar Glas Quarry and Sawdde Gorge
